context_before: User: Probably around 4 to 6 hours a day would be great.

context_after: User: Thanks! You too! Looking forward to your email!

contextual_notes: The user is seeking healthcare support for a family member, which can be a sensitive and urgent matter.
User satisfaction appears to be highly influenced by the timeliness and clarity of communication.
general_insights: Timely responses and clear communication are crucial in healthcare-related inquiries.
Setting clear expectations for follow-up can help maintain user satisfaction.
Providing positive confirmations can significantly enhance user satisfaction and trust.
